display_long_description:
# 😺 Play as a Cat
I Am Cat is a sandbox adventure centered around a cat protagonist. Embark on a meow journey as you embrace the role of a cat. Become a cat in a Granny's house full of quests, excitement, and exploration.
[media]

# 😺Massive Multiplayer
Play with lobbies up 20 people.
[media]

# 😺Invite friends and have fun
Create chaos with friends now in online!
[media]

# 😺 Tons of activities 
Explore new activities on brand new map.
[media]

# 😺 Sandbox Exploration
Roam freely through a big house full of secrets and quests. Granny’s house becomes a personal playground.

# 😺 Do Whatever You Want in Granny’s House
Cook, throw, run, and jump around Granny’s home. Use your paws to steal items from Granny’s house.

# 😺 Hide and Seek with Granny
Be stealthy and steal the items around. Fight as a cat against Granny, or become a friend of Granny. It is up to you.
[media]

# 😺 Variety of Interesting Quests
Take on missions designed specifically for a cat, testing your wits and curiosity.

# 😺Hidden Secrets and Puzzles
Find and solve a variety of puzzles and secrets around the rooms.
[media]

# 😺 Play Mini-Games
Engage in entertaining mini-games scattered throughout Granny’s house, such as football, basketball, catch the mouse, and more.
[media]

# 😺Create Chaos
Scratch furniture, destroy vases and plants, throw books—everything you see in the house is physics-based. 
[media]

# 😺 Sandbox Exploration
Roam freely through a big house full of secrets and quests. Granny’s house becomes a personal playground.

# 😺 Do Whatever You Want in Granny’s House
Cook, throw, run, and jump around Granny’s home. Use your paws to steal items from Granny’s house.

# 😺 Hide and Seek with Granny
Be stealthy and steal the items around. Fight as a cat against Granny, or become a friend of Granny. It is up to you.
